result.title: Contest.
result.content:
As some of you wish, I prepared a contest with past Polish OIs task.

Due to some technical issues, a contest is set on a Polish judge. Here's how to get access.

  1. Site is "szkopul.edu.pl". You have to register, it doesn't take much time.

  2. After registration go to : https://szkopul.edu.pl/c/omg-its-over-2000/join/Cgq1qHaccvIT-8i9GFf4xIzD/

  3. The link will give you access to the contest.

There are 5 problems, featuring DP, strings, graphs and maths.

Recommended duration is 5 hours, however contest will stay longer. Please don't cheat and have fun :P

Miyukine

UPD. Statements are available in English. See IMPORTANT notice on szkopul.edu.pl (#Rekt announcement)
